text: Three ships of the United States Navy have been named USS Denver, after the city of Denver, Colorado. * was a cruiser commissioned in 1904 and in service until 1931. * was a light cruiser commissioned 1942 and on active service in World War II, and decommissioned in 1947. * is an amphibious transport dock commissioned in 1968 and decommissioned in 2014. Category:United States Navy ship names
title: USS Denver
